absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
effects: heals user for 50% of damage dealt

mega_drain.name: Mega Drain
mega_drain.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
effects: heals user for 50% of damage dealt

leech_seed.name: Leech Seed
leech_seed.description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

vine_whip.name: Vine Whip
vine_whip.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

razor_leaf.name: Razor Leaf
razor_leaf.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pok√©mon. Critical hits land more easily.

solar_beam.name: Solar Beam
solar_beam.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

petal_dance.name: Petal Dance
petal_dance.description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

sleep_powder.name: Sleep Powder
sleep_powder.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

stun_spore.name: Stun Spore
stun_spore.description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

poison_powder.name: Poison Powder
poison_powder.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target.

spore.name: Spore
spore.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.
